tasks.title: Setup Project Repository
tasks.description: Initialize Next.js App Router project with TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and MDX configuration
tasks.details: Create new Next.js project using create-next-app, enable TypeScript, install Tailwind CSS with JIT mode, configure MDX support, and set up ESLint and Prettier for code quality
tasks.testStrategy: Verify project structure, check for successful build, confirm MDX files render correctly

tasks.title: Implement Navigation System
tasks.description: Create responsive navigation with sticky header, skip link, and mobile drawer
tasks.details: Build header component with sticky positioning, implement skip link for screen readers, create mobile drawer with 44×44px tap targets, and ensure keyboard navigation and focus trapping
tasks.testStrategy: Test navigation accessibility with screen readers, verify mobile drawer functionality across devices, check focus management

tasks.title: Design Hero Section
tasks.description: Create visually engaging hero section with CTAs and value proposition
tasks.details: Develop hero component with headline, subheadline, call-to-action buttons, and visual elements that communicate skills and personality, ensuring mobile responsiveness and accessibility
tasks.testStrategy: Verify visual hierarchy, check button accessibility, ensure mobile responsiveness

tasks.title: Create Project Card Component
tasks.description: Develop reusable ProjectCard component for work pages
tasks.details: Implement ProjectCard with title, summary, stack icons, and image display, ensuring consistent styling and accessibility attributes for all elements
tasks.testStrategy: Validate component rendering across different project types, check accessibility attributes

tasks.title: Implement Work Page Layout
tasks.description: Create filterable grid of ProjectCards for work section
tasks.details: Develop work page with responsive grid layout, implement filtering functionality, and ensure proper routing for individual project pages
tasks.testStrategy: Verify grid responsiveness, test filtering functionality, check routing behavior

tasks.title: Design Work Detail Page
tasks.description: Create detailed project page with Problem → Approach → Result structure
tasks.details: Develop work detail page with structured content sections, KPI callout, architecture diagram, and 'What I'd do next' section, ensuring proper routing and responsive design
tasks.testStrategy: Verify content structure, check responsive design, validate routing

tasks.title: Implement About Page
tasks.description: Create about page with bio, values, and skills section
tasks.details: Develop about page with structured content, including bio section, values statement, and skills visualization, ensuring accessibility and mobile responsiveness
tasks.testStrategy: Verify content structure, check accessibility, ensure mobile responsiveness

tasks.title: Design Writing Section
tasks.description: Create writing section with list and detail views with reading progress
tasks.details: Implement writing section with list view of posts, detail view with reading progress tracking using CSS scroll-timeline, and ensure reduced-motion fallback
tasks.testStrategy: Verify reading progress tracking, check reduced-motion fallback, validate responsive design

tasks.title: Implement Contact Form
tasks.description: Contact form implemented with accessibility, inline validation, and spam prevention mechanisms
tasks.details: Fully functional contact form with ARIA labels, React Hook Form, Zod validation, honeypot field, and /api/contact endpoint. Includes real-time validation, animations, and responsive design. Replaced mailto links with professional form integration.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify form accessibility, test validation logic, check spam prevention mechanisms

tasks.title: Configure SEO and Analytics
tasks.description: Implement SEO metadata and analytics tracking across all routes
tasks.details: Set up metadata API for dynamic SEO tags, implement structured data for Person/Article, and configure analytics tracking for page views, scroll depth, and Web Vitals
tasks.testStrategy: Verify SEO metadata, check structured data validity, validate analytics tracking implementation
